author: Mr. Linux
description: Mr. Linux is a learning resource that teaches Linux commands, tips and real-world workflows. Content is structured into beginner, intermediate and pro levels so you can grow from basic navigation to advanced system administration.

levels.label: Beginner
levels.summary: Safe commands and foundational concepts for new users.

levels.label: Intermediate
levels.summary: Practical tools for daily server and workstation use.

levels.label: Pro
levels.summary: Deep-dive topics: security, networking, monitoring and automation.

license: Open data for educational use. Please credit 'Mr. Linux' if you reuse this dataset.
